thread.title: Police Arrest A Cleaner For Raping And Robing A Northeast Woman In Haus Khas Village - Indiatimes.com
thread.title_full: Police Arrest A Cleaner For Raping And Robing A Northeast Woman In Haus Khas Village - Indiatimes.com

title: Police Arrest A Cleaner For Raping And Robing A Northeast Woman In Haus Khas Village - Indiatimes.com
text:
Indiatimes February 22, 2017 Police have arrested a 20-year-old man for allegedly raping a North-eastern woman in the capital’s south Delhi area. The woman, 24, was allegedly raped in Hauz Khas village on February 18 close to party central, Hauz Khas village. 
Representational image/letters to our brothers According to police, the accused has been identified as 'General' alias Raja. “General alias Raja, a resident of Arjun Nagar, has been arrested. He used to wash utensils at the restaurants and pubs located there,” DCP (South) Ishwar Singh said. Raja, accused of raping the woman twice at south Delhi’s popular Deer Park, worked as a ‘safai karamchari’ at one of the restaurants in Hauz Khas village and was aware of the topography of the area. "He had consumed liquor on the night of the incident," police said. 
Event brite Raja told the police that after raping the woman, he robbed her of her iPhone and Rs 600. He hadn’t come to his house for two days after the incident but was arrested when he returned home today, the police said. On the night of the incident, the woman was returning from a party in Hauz Khas village along with her friends and cousins. The woman told police that around 11.30 PM she was offered a drop home by an unknown person. Raja apparently told her that his vehicle was parked at some distance near the park. Thereafter, on the pretext of guiding the woman, he led her to an isolated stretch in the adjoining park area and allegedly raped her, said the officer. 
Flickr In order to escape from Raja, she hit him on his head with a stone, injuring him and escaping. 
With inputs from PTI
